data.short_description: Already in love with the Coloring Book for Kids? Take your creative habit even further and give your little ones an even bigger choice of coloring sheets. More coloring only means more fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
